Even madam Eno was taken by surprise when chika and her mother suddenly decided to quit their job, but she couldn't care less, there two many people out there without a job and will be willing to do anything to work for her. So she had no problem letting them go.

title: The Wise Prince: Chapter 11
body:
They both did not know when Joecelia was standing all alone on the field and then there was a car driving towards her. Jane and Angie turned to see, when they saw the car coming , they scremed, but it was too late. The car hit Joecilia and she fell, blood dripping from her forehead. Her sisters ran towards her, and the driver took her into the car, and they all went to the hospital.

[image](https://img.esteem.ws/h0jqhh8vpt.jpg)

Jane called her mother and she went to the hospital to see her daughter. Joecilia was admitted. The doctor attended to her. Joecelia finally woke up, and they all went home together.

Joecy, we are sorry we didn't know you were on the road, we are very sorry, Angie said. Who are you? sorry for what? Joecelia asked as she looked up.
Oh, Joecy, t's Angie and Jane your sisters, Angie replied.

body:
What's going on here, Joecelia? Why are you crying? She asked. 
It was Jane who told their mother what was happening. The woman consoled her grieving daughter.


[image](https://img.esteem.ws/h0jqhh8vpt.jpg)

Joecy, don't worry,  someone else will love you, Mrs. Lawson said. 
Her mother loved to see her daughter happy, so she decided to take her outside and told her many stories. But all that did not change her mood, but after three days Joecelia decided to forget about Seth. 

Mr. Quadri visited them often and was always glad to see Joecelia in her blind state. 
Stupid girl, you will remain blind forever, he said in his mind.

One day Joecelia told Angie and Jane that the house was boring, so they decided to go to the field to catch some fun. The girls held Joecelia's hands as they went. Angie and Jane were carried away by the fun they were having.
